sentences.en: Any unusual stiffness of either the horizontal or vertical axis is of course serious.
sentences.cn: 水平轴或者垂直轴任何异乎寻常的紧滞,自然是严重的问题.

sentences.en: Chronic mild fever, emaciation, loss of appetite, gait stiffness, some cough, have arthritis. Course of 1 month or so, the outcome of death.
sentences.cn: 慢性型轻度发热，消瘦，食欲不振，步态僵硬，有的咳嗽，有的出现关节炎。病程1月左右，转归死亡。

sentences.en: Direction is strong for regulation line slide way , stiffness.
sentences.cn: 纵向为矩行导边整轨,刚性强.

sentences.en: He put on his shoes in the cold and stood up, shaking himself in his stiffness.
sentences.cn: 他在寒冷中穿上鞋了,站起身来, 抖了抖自己僵硬的身子.

sentences.en: If you eat soon after your workout, you can minimize muscle stiffness and soreness.
sentences.cn: 如果在训练不久之后进食，就可以减缓肌肉僵硬和疼痛。

sentences.en: In general the bearing will be'non - linear ', the stiffness depending upon the value of h.
sentences.cn: 通常轴承是 “ 非线性 的”, 它的刚度随h值而变.

sentences.en: In many open - loop machines, there is single - valued relationship between loading rate and stiffness during dynamic testing.
sentences.cn: 许多开路机器在动态试验时,加载速度和刚度之间只有单值关系.

sentences.en: Real men embrace the stiffness in our muscles as we rise from bed each morning and the gradual loss of our sexual drive.
sentences.cn: 正像我们每天早晨从床上起来，我们的性欲冲动逐渐消失一样，真正的男人应欣然接受僵硬的肌肉。

sentences.en: She complained of stiffness in her joints. Accordingly she was admitted to hospital for further tests.
sentences.cn: 她诉说自己的关节不灵活, 于是被留院作进一步检查.

sentences.en: Stiffness and discomfort can usually be eased with heat or a warm bath.
sentences.cn: 肌肉酸痛和身体不适通常可以通过热敷或洗热水澡得到缓解。

sentences.en: The fourth - rank tensors contain the compliance and stiffness constants.
sentences.cn: 四秩张量包含柔量常数和刚度常数.

sentences.en: The requirement for a good test fixture is maximum stiffness for the lightest possible weight.
sentences.cn: 一台好的试验固紧装置应该是重量轻而刚度大.

sentences.en: The result is to reduce stiffness, which will prevent arthritis or improve it if you already have the condition. Maintaining many of the asanas encourages strength and endurance.
sentences.cn: 其结果是减少僵硬，这将防止关节炎或改进，如果你已经有了这个条件。体式保持了许多鼓励的力量和耐力。

sentences.en: The stiffness of the meeting soon gave way before their popular manners and more diffused intimacies.
sentences.cn: 他们的洒脱不羁和亲密气氛的增加很快驱散了会场上的拘谨.

sentences.en: There was a stiffness in him that would be hard to break.
sentences.cn: 他身上有一股难以制服的倔强劲.

sentences.en: This combination process is called the assemblage of stiffness matrices.
sentences.cn: 这种组合的过程称为刚度矩阵的装配.

sentences.en: Three fundamental cloth properties determine the handle, viz. stiffness, softness and bulkiness.
sentences.cn: 织物的三个基本性质决定手感, 即刚性, 柔软性和膨松性.

sentences.en: You also may do gentle stretching exercises to prevent stiffness.
sentences.cn: 你还应该做一些温和型的拉伸运动一次来避免腱子硬化.

sentences.en: You may want to boil out some of the stiffness.
sentences.cn: 你也许想烫掉一些浆性.

words.tran_cn: 呆板的；坚硬的；严厉的；拘谨的；拘谨的
死尸；令人讨厌者；流通票据；劳动者
加固物；[建] 加劲杆；刚性元件；兴奋剂

phrases.tran_cn: n. 抗弯刚度；抗挠刚度
刚劲因数；劲度因子；倔强因数
